entry.string: XarLinkMe Administration
What is it?

is a script to display your site's banners, and allow others to link to your site with them. Currently the implementation is rudimentary but useful for those that want a page with links to 'official' site banners.
Displays each of your site's 'official' banners with optional display of banner and link HTML code for users (optional config).
Simple client banner management options are currently in progress/TODO.
How to use it?
From the existing Admin menu options, only Modify Config menu option provides two working areas:
General Options - where you can set short URL and general module options
Site Linking Config - where you can set specific features for your LinkMe page
The additional Site Banner Link and Client Banners management links are in progress/todo.
To use the existing functionality for site linking:

Copy all of your site's banners into a directory which is in your web site path. This is the banner image directory that you can specify in the configuration setup. By default it is set to a subdirectory of the xarimages directory in the xarLinkMe directory. Change as required.
Make sure that the only files in your banner directory are your banner image files. For security, you can have a blank index.htm(l) file as well.
When naming your banner image files, give them a descriptive name, usually including the dimensions of the banner eg
Fill in the required information in the Modify Configuration Option
Go to the
user view of xarLinkMe
to see the resulting banner list.
Included Blocks
There are no blocks included. A client banner block is in progress
Included Hooks
This module has no hooks provided.
